note.p: Death: His house, Portman Square, London (03 December 1840)
Career: MP for Fifeshire (1806); MP for Kirkcaldy district of boroughs (1831); MP for Haddingtonshire (1835-1837); defeated (1837) and returned to represent Kirkcaldy;a staunch Whig
Notes: Original death date in BR (Dec 1841) has been altered.
